item.description:
http://aclum.org/dinn...
Reception at 6pm | Dinner at 7pm

Buy tickets now! ?

This year's speakers include:
Katrina vanden Heuvel
Katrina vanden Heuvel: The Nation editor and publisher Kerry Kennedy
Kerry Kennedy: author
and activist

Baratunde Thurston
Baratunde Thurston: comedian, writer, and editor at The Onion
Capt. James Yee
Captain James Yee: Army Chaplain at Guantanamo and the ACLU's 2009 Baldwin Award Winner

The 2009 Bill of Rights Dinner will take place at:

The Westin Copley Place Hotel
10 Huntington Avenue, Boston
item.how_to_find_us: please contact me if you can help in any way with this event. i have fliers.

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth
